kw.name: Open browser to application
kw.doc: Otevre prohlizec na strance dane aplikace

kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get Base Url
kw.doc: Metoda vraci base URL pro vybranou aplikaci / api.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Prihlasi se do aplikace rwa

kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Vlozi text do pole `Username`.

kw.doc: Stiskne tlacitko `SIGN IN`.

kw.doc: Pocka na zobrazeni tlacitka Logout.

kw.arg: Prihlaseni do aplikace rwa probehlo uspesne.
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get Account Balance
kw.doc: Nacte aktualni zustatek na uctu

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Aktualni vyse zustatku na uctu je: ${actual_account_balance}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Return From Keyword
kw.doc: Returns from the enclosing user keyword.
kw.msg: Returning from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Send money
kw.doc: Odesle prikaz k platbe pro zadaneho prijemce

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Click New Transaction Button
kw.doc: Stiskne tlacitko `$ NEW` pro otevreni nove transakce

kw.name: Select Recipient By Name
kw.doc: Vybere prijemce platby kliknutim na jeho jmeno.

kw.name: Enter Transaction Amount
kw.doc: Vyplni vysi transakce.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Enter Transaction Description
kw.doc: Vyplni pole pro popis platby.

kw.name: Submit Transaction
kw.doc: Stiskne tlacitko `PAY` pro odeslani platby.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Check account balance change
kw.doc: Overi, zda zmena zustatku na uctu odpovida zadane hodnote {transaction_amount} zmena zustatku na uctu je rovna rozdilu aktualniho zustatku a hodnoty globalni promenne {reference_account_balance}, tato promenna ma hodnotu 0 nebo je do ni ulozena hodnota aktualniho zustatku pri volani klicoveho slova `Get actual account balance`

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get Account Balance
kw.doc: Nacte aktualni zustatek na uctu

kw.arg: Aktualni vyse zustatku na uctu je: ${actual_account_balance}
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.arg: Vyhodnoceni zmeny vyse zustatku na uctu skocilo s vysledkem: ${result}

kw.name: Delete notifications
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Exit For Loop
